title: General information
desc: 1. All personal data has been voluntarily given to appear in this app and is stored in a public git repository. 2. Any sensitive information such as description, social network or images not suitable for minors will not be accepted of age, nor real images in case of being a minor. 3. After the indicated time the user will be eliminated from the app. Each user has a unique code by which they can request the modification or elimination of their data, in case of Not having it will be considered an attempt to impersonate and it will only be deleted after the stipulated time. 4. The creator reserves the right to admit, deny or delete any information for any reason.

title: Easter Eggs - Pokehigher or Pokelower
desc: The app 'Pokehigher or Pokelower' from the Play Store has 4 hidden easter eggs. The first one that it finds will appear in the app for 365 days. The user's 'description' will have the hashtag # 4pokeastereggs to indicate who found it .

title: Other cases
desc: Exceptionally, I can contact you and offer to appear in the app with limited or unlimited time.
